languages.text: "Немногое, Лорд-капитан. Связь с вашей группой была потеряна вскоре после высадки на корабль предполагаемых пиратов, похитивших... сородичей вашей спутницы. Мы немедленно выслали челноки с абордажными командами вам на помощь, но... на корабле так и не было никого обнаружено, кроме зарезанной или спятившей команды".

traits.locale_text: "Немногое, Лорд-капитан. Связь с вашей группой была потеряна вскоре после высадки на корабль предполагаемых пиратов, похитивших... сородичей вашей спутницы. Мы немедленно выслали челноки с абордажными командами вам на помощь, но... на корабле так и не было никого обнаружено, кроме зарезанной или спятившей команды".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."
languages.original_text: "Немногое, Лорд-капитан. Связь с вашей группой была потеряна вскоре после высадки на корабль предполагаемых пиратов, похитивших... сородичей вашей спутницы. Мы немедленно выслали челноки с абордажными командами вам на помощь, но... на корабле так и не было никого обнаружено, кроме зарезанной или спятившей команды".

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. Contact with your party was lost soon after the ship was invaded by alleged pirates who abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding teams to your aid, but... we never found anyone on the ship save for the partly butchered, partly insane crew."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. Contact with your party was lost soon after the ship was invaded by alleged pirates who abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding teams to your aid, but... we never found anyone on the ship save for the partly butchered, partly insane crew."

We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «No mucho, Lord Capitán. Perdimos el contacto con su equipo poco después de que los supuestos piratas abordasen la nave y capturasen a... los congéneres de su acompañante. Enviamos inmediatamente lanzaderas con grupos de abordaje en su ayuda, pero... no encontramos a nadie en la nave salvo a los miembros de su tripulación, todos masacrados o enloquecidos».
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."

traits.locale_text: «No mucho, Lord Capitán. Perdimos el contacto con su equipo poco después de que los supuestos piratas abordasen la nave y capturasen a... los congéneres de su acompañante. Enviamos inmediatamente lanzaderas con grupos de abordaje en su ayuda, pero... no encontramos a nadie en la nave salvo a los miembros de su tripulación, todos masacrados o enloquecidos».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “我们并不太清楚，舰长大人。一群看起来像是海盗的人登上了那艘舰船，绑架了……您所有的同伴，随后我们就与您的队伍失去了联系。我们立即派出了穿梭机，载着登舰部队来协助您。然而……我们在船上没有发现任何人，除了那艘船原来的船员。那些人不是死了，就是疯了。”
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."

traits.locale_text: “我们并不太清楚，舰长大人。一群看起来像是海盗的人登上了那艘舰船，绑架了……您所有的同伴，随后我们就与您的队伍失去了联系。我们立即派出了穿梭机，载着登舰部队来协助您。然而……我们在船上没有发现任何人，除了那艘船原来的船员。那些人不是死了，就是疯了。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Pas grand-chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous avons perdu tout contact avec votre groupe peu après que les prétendus pirates ont abordé le vaisseau et enlevé... les semblables de votre compagne. Nous avons immédiatement envoyé des navettes d'intervention à votre aide, mais... nous n'avons trouvé personne à bord à l'exception des membres de l'équipage qui avaient tous été massacrés ou étaient devenus fous. »
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."

traits.locale_text: « Pas grand-chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous avons perdu tout contact avec votre groupe peu après que les prétendus pirates ont abordé le vaisseau et enlevé... les semblables de votre compagne. Nous avons immédiatement envoyé des navettes d'intervention à votre aide, mais... nous n'avons trouvé personne à bord à l'exception des membres de l'équipage qui avaient été massacrés ou étaient devenus fous. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「あまり多くは存じておりません、ロード・キャプテン。海賊が船に乗り込み、あなたの仲間の同族を拉致した直後、あなた方との連絡が途絶えました。すぐに部隊を乗せたシャトルを送り込みましたが…乗組員以外、船には誰もいませんでした。そして乗組員は皆、虐殺されたか、正気を失っていました」
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."

traits.locale_text: 「あまり多くは存じておりません、ロード・キャプテン。海賊が船に乗り込み、あなたの仲間の同族を拉致した直後、あなた方との連絡が途絶えました。すぐに部隊を乗せたシャトルを送り込みましたが…乗組員以外、船には誰もいませんでした。そして乗組員は皆、虐殺されたか、正気を失っていました」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Nicht viel, Lord Captain. Der Kontakt zu Eurem Trupp ist sofort abgebrochen, nachdem die angeblichen Piraten das Schiff geentert und ... die Verwandten Eures Gefährten verschleppt hatten. Wir haben Euch unverzüglich Shuttles mit Entertrupps zur Hilfe geschickt, doch ... wir haben niemanden auf dem Schiff vorgefunden, nur die Crew, die entweder abgeschlachtet worden war oder den Verstand verloren hatte."
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht viel, Lord Captain. Der Kontakt zu Eurem Trupp ist sofort abgebrochen, nachdem die angeblichen Piraten das Schiff geentert und ... die Verwandten Eures Gefährten verschleppt hatten. Wir haben Euch unverzüglich Shuttles mit Entertrupps zur Hilfe geschickt, doch ... wir haben niemanden auf dem Schiff vorgefunden, nur die Crew, die entweder abgeschlachtet worden war oder den Verstand verloren hatte."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Fazla bir şey bilmiyorum Lord Kaptan. Sözde korsanların gemiyi bordalayıp yoldaşınızın soydaşlarını kaçırmasından kısa süre sonra grubunuzla iletişim tamamen kesildi. Yardım etmek için hemen mekikler ve bordacılar gönderdik ama... Gemide tayfalardan başkasını bulamadık, onların da neredeyse hepsi ya öldürülmüş ya da delirmişti."
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. All contact with your party was lost shortly after the supposed pirates boarded the ship and abducted... your companion's kinspeople. We immediately sent shuttles with boarding parties to your aid, but... we didn't find anyone on the ship save for the crew, all of whom had either been butchered or driven insane."

traits.locale_text: "Fazla bir şey bilmiyorum Lord Kaptan. Sözde korsanlar gemiye binip yoldaşlarınızın soyunu kaçırdıktan kısa süre sonra grubunuzla olan iletişim tamamen kesildi. Yardım etmek için hemen mekikler ve baskın ekipleri gönderdik ama... Gemide tayfadan başka kimseyi bulamadık, onların da neredeyse hepsi ya parçalanmış ya da deliye dönmüştü."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
